net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j
Interface Postable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArchiveHttpd, ArchiveStringTemplateHandler, FileHttpd, FileStringTemplateHandler, Httpd, StringTemplateHandler
public interface Postable

An interface that must be implemented by classes processing POST requests.

Author:
Donald Munro
See Also:
Httpd.addPostHandler(java.lang.String, net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j.Postable)

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object onHandlePost(long id, com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange ex, Request request, HttpResponse response, java.io.File dir, java.lang.Object... extraParameters)
          Called when the server is about to perform a POST.
 

Method Detail

onHandlePost

java.lang.Object onHandlePost(long id,
                              com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange ex,
                              Request request,
                              HttpResponse response,
                              java.io.File dir,
                              java.lang.Object... extraParameters)
Called when the server is about to perform a POST. May be used by an overiding class to generate dynamic content. The overiding class should return a new File or if it does not handle the post then it should return null. The resulting file will be processed as a GET request,

Parameters:
id - Unique transaction id
ex - The HttpExchange instance for this request.
request - The Request
response - Response instance
dir - - Directory where output can be created
extraParameters - Extra parameters that can be used by overiding classes
Returns:
return either an HttpResponse instance or a new File instance within the base directory structure of the Httpd instance. If a File is returned it will be processed as a GET request.
